properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
DNC 07.
1. VESSEL DOM MANOEL XVI, SEVEN PERSONS ON
   BOARD, UNREPORTED. LAST KNOWN POSITION IN
   32-03.05S 051-49.47W ON 11 AUG. VESSELS IN
   VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
   ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO ANY COASTAL
   RADIO STATION.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2473/17.
